title: my account got a permanent suspension........how?
body: i was playing 1v1s with my buddy and after the game was over my client closed and it said this account has been permanently suspended by  riot games...... does anybody know what happen please comment if you can help me i already tried league support but they are sending me to recover my account but i have it i just want the ban to be lifted i dont know what i did

replies.body:
Continuing to work with the support agent in your ticket is the best course of action here. You can always ask for more context regarding your account in your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
when i got a perma suspension i didnt get a reason why and what i did to get it is this what usually happens ...... if it is not can you tell me the reason i got a perma?

Usually, you'll get an email that provides context around the suspension. I can't discuss account-specific stuff such as suspensions here on the boards, but as I stated above, you can address those questions to the agent in your ticket.
From my experience when I read the permanent ban problems on other boards, mostly they've never gotten an email when the cause were payment problems

I just 2 week suspension for "MMR Boosting" even though ive never engaged in the act before? Ive played while traveling and at my ex girlfriends house before and ive also changed my password because ive logged on while using her laptop before just to be safe. I sent in support ticket but no responses and im afraid of getting an automated response. Any way a rioter could look into this?
